General.Name: Innelec Multimedia
General.Description: Innelec Multimédia SA distributes various multimedia products in France and internationally. It offers console and PC games; games consoles; gaming accessories; mobility accessories, such as chargers, Bluetooth speakers, luggage, hard drives, cables, as well as waterproof pouches; licensed derivative products; high-tech accessories; and audio accessories. The company primarily sells its products to the retailers. Innelec Multimédia SA was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Pantin, France.
